name: certificated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having an official document as proof that something has happened or been done: They offer classes taught by certificated teachers. Some popular stocks could originally be bought and sold only in certificated form. See
certificateSynonym
certified
More examplesFewer examplesThe bonus programme is intended to reward teachers and other certificated employees, such as principals and librarians. Recommendations include employment of those trained or certificated in gerontology, geriatrics or psychogeriatrics.The district has 530 full-time certificated staff.

having a certificate, sometimes one that shows that a particular standard has been reached: certificated stocks He had qualified as a certificated flight instructor.
